programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: Seorang samseng yang ingin menjadi pelakon; seorang pelakon yang lebih gangster daripada segala-galanya. Di sini laluan dan kehidupan mereka mula bersilang.

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: Seorang detektif memulakan usaha tanpa henti untuk membebaskan anaknya daripada kapal perang asing yang ngeri.

programme.title: Plan B Ep13
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan Iris disoalsiat polis. Dia mendakwa dirinya tidak langsung mengetahui tujuan Khai sebenarnya sehingga dia terlibat dalam rompakan. Namun Khai, Mika, Que dan Iris disabit kesalahan kerana merompak secara berkumpulan dengan bersenjata api dan dihukum penjara sepanjang hayat. Setelah beberapa kali percubaan dalam rayuan kes tersebut, Iris hanya dipenjara beberapa tahun sahaja. Bagaimanapun Khai akan berusaha memboloskan diri dari penjara dan dia berjanji untuk membunuh Iris.

programme.title: Sangkar
programme.desc: Adam dan Johan merupakan atlet sukan bela diri campuran (MMA). Adam bersikap angkuh dan telah menang sebuah pertarungan dengan taktik kotornya. Mereka ialah musuh dan selalu bersaing. Suatu hari, apabila dicabar di luar sangkar, Adam secara tidak sengaja mencederakan Johan. Johan tercedera parah dan ahli keluarganya hilang punca rezeki dan harapan. Untuk menebus kesalahannya, Adam kembali bertarung di pertarungan bawah tanah untuk mendapatkan habuan supaya dapat membantu Johan sekeluarga. Johan pula sedang bertarung dengan kesihatan dan pemulihan demi keluarganya. Pada saat ini, Adam mengingatkan tujuan diri sebagai pejuang MMA dan mengambil cabaran untuk berlawan dengan pejuang MMA antarabangsa.

programme.title: Bodyguard S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Maya mengambil perkhidmatan bodyguard bernama Rahul untuk menjaga keselamatan dan anaknya Aiman dari gangguan bekas suami bernama Mikhail. Ika isteri Mikhail akan diberi harta kekayaan bapanya sekiranya mereka mempunyai anak. Ika selalu mendesak Mikhail mendapatkan anak kandungnya dari Maya. Mereka bercadang menggunakan mahkamah untuk mendapatkan Aiman. Farish pula sebagai bodyguard kepada Adam anak kepada Dato’ Nora, Adam telah terlibat dengan Kumpulan Kobra yang melakukan jenayah. Oleh itu Farish terpaksa menyertai kumpulan penjahat tersebut untuk menjaga Adam. Ryan sebagai bodyguard kepada Eliza, dia menjaga keselamatan Eliza dari diculik oleh penjahat. Eliza di bawa oleh Rashid berjumpa dengan ibunya yang sakit. Elisa memberi RM 80 ribu untuk perbelanjaan pembedahannya. Ryan yang menjadi bodyguard Datin Maziah isteri kepada Dato’ Jailani mendapat maklumat Datin Maziah mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan Badrul. Perkara ini dimaklumkan kepada Dato’ Zailani. Mereka sebagai bodyguard memberi maklumat harian kepada Nasha sebagai ketua jabatan. Ryan secara sembunyi masih berterusan memberi bunga kepada Nasha

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep12
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shah, Adam dan Daniel masih berada di pekan di sempadan dalam usaha menjejaki dan mengesan lembaga perahu. Berbagai usaha dan ikhtiar dilakukan mereka. Ini termasuk meletakkan bubu yang mengandungi ikan ke dalam sungai di kawasan disyaki lembaga sungai berada. Akhirnya pada suatu malam, mereka dapat mengesan dan dengan kaedah senjata yang biasa mereka gunakan lembaga sungai itu dapat diperangkap. Walau pun mendapat tentangan oleh seorang wanita separuh umur, mengakui kepunyaannya tetapi dengan nasihat yang diberikan agar dia lebih keterampilan lalu mereka beredar dari wanita itu. Mereka bersiap hendak pulang. Shah lambat dan semasa Adam menurutnya ke bilik, Adam mendapati rupanya selama ini Shah yang sedang dilamun cinta dan berkasih terhadap Nur. Adam meminta penjelasan daripada Nur sebaik-baik mereka tiba dari bandar sempadan. Nur menjelaskan hatinya terpaut dengan Shah. Ibu Nur dan bapa Nur kini saling tidak sefahaman semula akibat baju. Nur agakkecewa tetapi akan berusaha lagi.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Seorang gadis buta mendapat pemindahan kornea supaya dia dapat melihat semula. Dia mendapat lebih daripada yang dia tawarkan apabila menyedari dia juga boleh melihat hantu.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Ingin cuba melakukan perubahan demi kemajuan di kampung namun tidak semua bersetuju dengan perubahan yang dibawa olehnya. Pelbagai halangan perlu ditempuhinya namun dia bersikap pantang berundur sebelum berjuang.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Guru Badul
programme.desc: Badul diambil bekerja di pejabat Hj. Lamin sebagai seorang pengutip hutang. Badul sebenarnya berpura-pura menjadi orang alim membuatkan Hj. Lamin sangat tertarik akan perwatakannya itu. Dia banyak mempelajari ilmu agama dengan Badul dan ingin menjadikannya sebagai seorang menantu. Namun satu insiden telah memecahkan rahsianya apabila Hj. Lamin terlihat Badul sedang menari-nari.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Ingin cuba melakukan perubahan demi kemajuan di kampung namun tidak semua bersetuju dengan perubahan yang dibawa olehnya. Pelbagai halangan perlu ditempuhinya namun dia bersikap pantang berundur sebelum berjuang.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.

programme.title: Taman Langsat Mayestik
programme.desc: Ozie, seorang pengarah filem, menjemput seorang penerbit untuk membuat filem seram. Ozie mengupah pasukan casting, tetapi dia tidak berpuas hati dengan hasilnya. Jadi dia mempunyai idea untuk memilih pelakon di lokasi paling berhantu di Jakarta.

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: The Dream Boyz
programme.desc: Filem ini menceritakan kisah lapan sahabat dari Persatuan Drama di sekolah menengah mereka yang ingin membuat filem pertama mereka sebelum mereka menamatkan pengajian. Tetapi kumpulan itu menghadapi pelbagai masalah dan halangan yang menguji persahabatan mereka sepanjang perjalanan.

programme.title: Fainow
programme.desc: kisah pergolakan rumah tangga sepasang suami isteri selepas sang isteri mendapat tahu kecurangan suaminya.

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Salah Alamat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luqman pernah mengenali seorang gadis bernama Diana ketika Diana melanggar keretanya dahulu. Diana berpenampilan seksi dan mengamalkan cara hidup barat membuatkan Luqman bersangka buruk terhadap Diana. Satu hari, Luqman ke masjid dan terserempak dengan seorang gadis cantik iaitu Adawiyah. Tanpa mengetahui, Adawiyah dan Diana adalah orang yang sama. Diana pernah terlibat dengan kemalangan dan sejak itu hidupnya berubah sepenuhnya.

programme.title: Keeping Your Heart
programme.desc: Trang mempunyai keluarga yang sempurna, isteri yang baik dengan anak perempuan dan anak lelaki. Dia teragak-agak apabila Tawanwad, seorang artis wanita, datang ke dalam hidupnya. Dia terpaksa memilih antara tugas atau perasaan di hatinya.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Selubung
programme.desc: seorang wanita kembali ke tanah air selepas menamatkan pembelajaran diluar negara, memilih untuk menjadi sukarelawan di sebuah pertubuhan kebajikan yang membantu anak-anak pelarian Palestin. Dia berkenalan dan jatuh cinta dengan seorang pemuda yang turut aktif dalam kegiatan sosial anjuran pertubuhan itu.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Sandiwara Cinta Terjebak Flexing
programme.desc: Aksi penyamaran Aldo dan Ferdi berjaya menyatukan mereka dengan cinta sejati masing-masing, iaitu Risa dan Mila.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep147
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep63
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep12
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep92
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep133
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Utang Nyak Gue Lunas Di Pelaminan
programme.desc: Berkahwin di usia muda membuatkan Kinan dan Alvin terpaksa menjalaninya dengan penuh liku-liku, masalah timbul apabila bekas kekasih Alvin datang dan kacau semuanya.

programme.title: Suster El Ep5
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep15
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Kemana Saingan Dimana Mana
programme.desc: Tio telah lama mencari Alifia, teman masa kecilnya. Namun, tanpa disadari, mereka telah saling jatuh cinta sebelum mengetahui bahwa mereka berdua sebenarnya adalah teman masa kecil.

programme.title: Kamera Cinta Ep9
programme.desc: Kamera Cinta adalah adaptasi format antarabangsa dari "Hear Me Love Me See Me", di mana seorang wanita bujang akan bertemujanji dengan 6 orang lelaki tanpa dapat melihat satu sama lain. Ketika bertemujanji, lelaki akan menggunakan kamera aksi di badan mereka dan wanita bujang dapat berkenalan dengan rakan, keluarga atau rakan sekerja mereka. Hanya seorang lelaki yang akan dipilih dan akan melangkah ke peringkat seterusnya.

Setelah pernikahan, usaha Tomy mengalami penurunan dan ibunya menyalahkan Alda karena miskin dan tidak bisa membantu suaminya. Ketika usahanya mulai membaik, Tomy berselingkuh dengan mitra bisnisnya. Akankah Alda mampu menerima kenyataan ini?

programme.title: Konser Terima Kasih Bunda
programme.desc: Mari kita ungkapkan dan tunjukkan kasih sayang kepada ibu pada saat istimewa ini.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: The Table
programme.desc: Four conversations surrounding 4 females who all have different stories to tell take place at a table at a cafe. See how their hearts flutters with love but also gets troubled by it.

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: A Special Lady
programme.desc: A woman who becomes the second-in-command of a gangster organization-turned-leading business entity, fights against the ruthless world of man's society, to protect her only son.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep4445
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep4
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep841842
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep675
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3377
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46434644
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep3334
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1823
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep884
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: Hello Stranger

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other’s mole.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous “Finger of Doom”, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.desc: Penang to Cameron Highlands - Michael rides one of the steepest and fastest funicular railways in the world and steps into a tropical paradise as he releases exotic specimens at Malaysia's first butterfly sanctuary.

programme.title: Inside the Factory 6 S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809. The British drink a staggering 195 million mugs of tea and coffee every day, so Gregg is following production of one of the factory's best sellers, the Halo Heritage mug.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean 1 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Feelings - The spies seek out proof of emotions in the animals and fish they interact with. Spy dolphin tries to keep up with real dolphins as they play in the surf; spy sperm whale sees a calf's mother's loving bond; spy cuttlefish discovers that male cuttlefish can be very jealous and spy seal helps a lonely seal pup to join the older pups in play.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads 4 S4 Ep5

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall 2 S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Socorro - Steve Backshall is in Mexico exploring the Eastern Pacific and the Ravillagigedo Archipelago to find ways to protect the local shark population.

programme.title: Inside the Factory 6 S6 Ep5
programme.desc: Chairs - Gregg Wallace and the team look inside a furniture factory making chair, following it from carving wood to making the finish product.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Antarctica - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Antarctica and its inhabitants, and the challenges faced due to the changing climate.

programme.title: Extreme Treks 4 S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 1 - Join Ryan and his team as they explore the city of Zurich, and then set out from Vaduz in Liechtenstein to embark on this mammoth trek towards Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild 3 S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Australia - Ben Fogle returns to the Australian outback to revisit Barbara Walker, who has been living alone in a remote site for sixteen years.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing 1 S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Guinea Bissau - Robson travels to the remote island off the west coast of Africa for the Guinea Bissau Grand Slam, but he must get to grips with the extreme tides to have any chance of success.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ancient Lineages - Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Turtle's Legacy - The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Hummingbird’s Quest - From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rivers - Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Skies - Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Breton’s Bras d’Or Lake, to the bird’s overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagle’s raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Leaping Into Life - It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Warriors of the Llanos - The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand’s Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Delta Discoveries - The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fall on the Tundra - Nunavik, meaning “Great Land”, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tides - Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollinators - The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild East’s most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Finding a Family - Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Delta Discoveries - The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay searches for the UK's most exciting new food and drink business, putting 12 entrepreneurs through a series of challenges as they compete to win his £150,000 investment.

programme.desc: Sicily A Family Thing - Jack enjoys a secret drink with a long-lost Queen, races cars and meets mafia-fighting bar owners on the island of Sicily.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Radio Silence - Ariel disappears from radio contact, putting emergency services on red alert. Over the village of Hopper Bay, pilot Erik Snuggerud battles to touch down.

programme.title: The Road Less Traveled: Asia 2 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Philippines II - Jonathan is no stranger to the Philippines, but there's a lot more to explore!

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Glacier Inferno Sea Serpent Cecil And Boogie Bomb - Don Wildman recounts a desperate race to escape a raging wildfire, investigates a real-life sea monster that made a splash along the New England coastline.

programme.title: Legends Of The Lost With Megan Fox S1 Ep4
programme.desc: America's Lost Civilization - Megan Fox seeks to find who -- or what -- were the earliest settlers of America.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S17 Ep6
programme.desc: Goodwin Home Invasion - Aaron’s father calls the crew to his home in Las Vegas to investigate threatening paranormal activity. He believes he has seen an apparition of a young girl.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Greece The Morning After - Ouzo, a marathon plate-smashing bachelor party, sheep and an ancient hangover cure . . . or not.

programme.title: The Road Less Traveled: Asia 2 S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Special - As is tradition, Jonathan recounts the tale of the season. From disasters and blunders to genuine moments, he meticulously goes through what he learned.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Gangster Frankenstein Oregon Desert Mystery And Gh - Don Wildman exposes a chilling plot to raise the dead, examines possible proof of extraterrestrial visitors in the desert, and investigates a medical mystery.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S17 Ep7
programme.desc: Union Brewery Of Death - The crew is back in Virginia City, NV, to investigate a haunted historic brewery. A fire and a short stint as a funeral home has created a weird energy.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald can’t wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbor’s suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep11
programme.desc: Friday Night Liyotes - When Grug won't let her join his winning team, Eep forms her own underdog team in the first-ever sports competition – Ahhh! Valley's annual Egg Toss.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep9
programme.desc: Lucky And The Super Amazing And Fun Cousin Julian - Luckys buttons are pushed when her seemingly perfect cousin Julian comes to visit but reveals himself to be a junior con man

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep9
programme.desc: Wary Lotta & The Chamber Of Secrets / Vhmess - Lotta spills a secret and worries the kids of Harvey Street won’t like her if they hear it! The girls discover a broken VHS tape which inspires them to film their own ending.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out there’s a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bad Beat Of The Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Ghastly Danger Of The Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep13
programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep14
programme.desc: Team Astrid - After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.desc: Fugitive'S Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family
